TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 事件配置文件。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event profiles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`profiles`元素`healthMonitoring`配置文件节。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `profiles` element of the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file. 事件配置文件确定如何通过 ASP.NET 收集和提供程序中引发事件。Event profiles determine how events are collected by ASP.NET and raised to providers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的几个特性指定值`profiles`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `profiles` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件摘录演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值`profiles`部分。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the `profiles` section. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按以下方式形成类型引用 （括号中的项不是必需的）： *Namespace*。*Typename*， *Assemblyname*[、] [版本 = x，] [区域性 = y，] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 例如，"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType，Example.Assembly，版本 = %assembly_version%，区域性 = neutral，PublicKeyToken = %microsoft_publickey%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#66](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#66)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#66](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#66)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须大于零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 值可以通过无限将其设置为。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 无效的值可能导致保存的配置节时引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此属性指定将引发事件的相同类型的最大次数。This property specifies the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值为`10`，将引发 10 次，之后便忽略该事件。For example if the value is `10`, the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#63)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#63)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置事件在其引发到提供程序前所出现的最少次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of event occurrences before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 事件在其激发到提供程序前所出现的最少次数。

span.span: The minimum number of event occurrences before the event is fired to the provider.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须大于零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 值可以通过无限将其设置为。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 无效的值可能导致保存的配置节时引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此属性指定事件发生之前将引发一个事件到提供程序最小次数。This property specifies the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，值`5`意味着 ASP.NET 不会引发一个事件到该提供程序，直到发生事件的第五个实例。For example, a value of `5` means that ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. 如果值为无穷大 ()，则将给提供程序不引发任何事件。If the value is infinite (), then no event will be raised to the provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#64)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#64)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MinInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置两个相同类型事件之间的最小间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: 一个 ，指定两个相同类型事件之间的最小间隔。

span.span: A that specifies the minimum interval between two events of the same type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可以通过无限将其设置为。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 保存的配置节时，无效的值可能会引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception when the configuration section is saved. 如果值为，则没有最小时间间隔。If the value is , then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object.
The name of the object.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个唯一的名称是必需的。A unique name is required. 保存的配置节时，重复的名称可能会导致数据丢失。Duplicate names may result in a loss of data when the configuration section is saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
